meanings: (물속으로) sink; (홍수 등으로) be flooded, be submerged, be swamped (by/with)
(생각·슬픔 등에) be absorbed in, be lost in, be immersed in
(문·자물쇠 등이) lock, fasten, be locked, be fastened

vlive.korean: [STEP 11] 냄비에 닭, 수삼, 대추, 양파, 파를 넣고 닭이 60% 잠길 정도의 물을 넣은 후 끓여주세요. Add all the ingredients and add water so that 60% of the chicken is soaked. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 김상균의 삼계탕🍗 (HOW TO COOK KIM SANG GYUN’s Samgyetang)
vlive.english: Add all the ingredients and add water so that 60% of the chicken is soaked.

vlive.korean: 살짝 고기 잠길 때까지. Until the meat is flooded. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]황치열 X 엄마레시피 (HWANG CHI YEUL X Mom's Recipe)
다 했어 - 완전 잠길 만큼? We are done. - Enough to cover it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]OH MY GIRL X Calling Recipe - 오마이걸 X 부재중레시피

examples.korean: If the dam breaks, it will inundate large parts of the town. 발음듣기 만약 댐이 무너지면 그 마을의 대부분 지역이 물에 잠길 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the dam breaks, it will inundate large parts of the town. 발음

examples.korean: My house almost got flooded. 발음듣기 하마터면 집이 물에 잠길 뻔했다 Neungyule
examples.english: My house almost got flooded. 발음

examples.korean: From now on the gates will be locked at midnight. 발음듣기 차후에는 문이 한밤중에 잠길 것이다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: From now on the gates will be locked at midnight. 발음

examples.korean: If it keeps on raining at the present rate for ten more days, the whole city of Seoul will be flooded. 발음듣기 이대로 열흘만 더 비가 오면 전 서울 시가 홍수에 잠길 것이다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If it keeps on raining at the present rate for ten more days, the whole city of Seoul will be flooded. 발음

examples.korean: My house came very close to being flooded. 발음듣기 하마터면 집이 물에 잠길 뻔했다 Neungyule
examples.english: My house came very close to being flooded. 발음
